participants.name: Alex Ovalle
participants.title: Recruiter / US Division Projects manager at Intertec International

messages.message:
Python opportunity

Hi Brian, 

We currently have a small 1 moth to 7 week assignment for a Python developer in Mesa. I wanted to find out if you might be open to engage this assignment or if you might know of anybody interested in this temporary opportunity. The main skills we look for are:

This would be a Python developer that has experience in the following areas:

•	FTP server/client on Python
•	UDP server/client support on Python
•	What Python Wheels will we be using to accomplish our business goals / how updates occur
•	Threading, interprocess communication, 
•	Resource contention management/testing (particularly on the Cradlepoint Python “carveout” execution environment)
•	Exception/Error handling (particularly on the Cradlepoint Python “carveout” execution environment)
•	Relational storage (particularly on the Cradlepoint Python “carveout” execution environment)
•	Development Environment (Use of Visual Studio IDE, other tooling, Windows vs Linux)
•	Unit & Integration testing – Frameworks, approaches, limitations
•	Performance testing in general
•	Deployment strategy/tactics (Particularly with Cradlepoint EMC in the mix)
Please let me know if you would be interested in this and if so, what would your rate be.
Thanks,

Alex Ovalle
Recruiter at Intertec International
alex.ovalle@intertecintl.com
